sentences.en: All the seats were in red plush.
sentences.cn: 所有座位都上了红色长毛绒面。

sentences.en: College brochures tout ivy - covered campuses, plush dorms and high - tech fitness centers.
sentences.cn: 爬满青藤的校园 、 豪华的宿舍和高科技健身中心,这些都是高校画册招揽生意的招数.

sentences.en: Does she have cut - glass chandeliers, plush curtains and dozens of mirrors?
sentences.cn: 那里有玻璃做的枝状大台灯, 豪华的窗帘和许多镜子 吗 ?

sentences.en: Fake Fur Fabric, Sherpa Fabric, Plush Fabric, Velour, Velvet, Polar Fleece Fabrics.
sentences.cn: 采购产品假毛皮织物, 夏尔巴织物, 长毛绒织物, 丝绒, 天鹅绒, 摇粒绒面料.

sentences.en: His private room is plush and spacious but he is not comfortable.
sentences.cn: 他的专用房间豪华宽敞,但他却感到不舒服.

sentences.en: I was surprised at the plush red carpeting and comfortable chairs.
sentences.cn: 我对华美的红地毯和舒适的椅子感到惊讶.

sentences.en: Soon I was stepped into the plush comfort of a skyscraper office.
sentences.cn: 不久之后,我又踏入了一间摩天大厦中的极其舒适的办公室.

sentences.en: The daycoach was hot, full of the weary smell of old red plush.
sentences.cn: 二等车厢非常闷热, 满鼻子旧红绒椅垫的陈年味道.

sentences.en: The dead tycoon's sons will remain in their plush offices overseeing the death throes of the family empire.
sentences.cn: 这位已故大亨的儿子们将坐在豪华的办公室里，目睹这个家族帝国崩溃前的痛苦挣扎。

sentences.en: The little girl likes that plush toy bear the most.
sentences.cn: 小姑娘最喜欢的就是那个长毛绒的玩具小熊.

sentences.en: The machine is for ironing cut materials of plush products.
sentences.cn: 本机器适用于汤切割毛绒材料产品.

sentences.en: The room was furnished in red plush.
sentences.cn: 房间里用红色天鹅绒作装饰.

sentences.en: Their casino is the plushest in town.
sentences.cn: 他们的赌场是城里最豪华的。

sentences.en: This machine is for ironing cut materials of plush products.
sentences.cn: 本机器适用于烫切割毛绒材料产品.

sentences.en: This material is a mixture fabric of pure wool and plush.
sentences.cn: 这种料子是纯羊毛与长毛绒的混纺织物.

sentences.en: We are manufacturer of plush toys, dolls, curtains, bedsheets, embroideries etc.
sentences.cn: 我们是专业的毛绒玩具 、 玩偶 、 窗帘 、 床单 、 绣品等产品的生产商.

words.tran_cn: 豪华的；时髦的；长毛绒的；奢侈豪华的

trans.tran_cn: 〈俚〉豪华的，漂亮的，舒服的，长毛绒做的
trans.tran_en: very comfortable, expensive, and of good quality

trans.tran_cn: 长绒棉，长毛绒，长毛绒裤
trans.tran_en: a silk or cotton material with a thick soft surface
